article.Heading: Budget 2017: FM may cut corporate tax rate significantly: Nirmal Jain
article.Summary: In an interview to CNBC-TV18’s Sonia Shenoy & Udayan Mukherjee, Nirmal Jain of IIFL, Raamdeo Agarwal of Motilal Oswal and Neelkanth Mishra of Credit Suisse gave their take on what Arun Jaitely’s Union Budget may look like and the road ahead.
article.Body:
In an interview to CNBC-TV18’s Sonia Shenoy & Udayan Mukherjee, Nirmal Jain of IIFL, Raamdeo Agarwal of Motilal Oswal and Neelkanth Mishra of Credit Suisse gave their take on what Arun Jaitely’s Union Budget may look like and the road ahead.

For entire discussion, watch accompanying videos...
